function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of wireless sensor networks introduces security vulnerabilities.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensor data or control of environmental systems.","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and authentication protocols for sensor communication.","Technologies":"Strong encryption, authentication protocols, secure communication standards.","People":"Occupants, building managers, IT professionals.","Owner":"IT professionals, security experts."},{"Description":"Contagious diseases can be spread through the built environment, especially in public buildings and schools.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential illness or spread of a contagious disease.","Mitigation":"Implement air quality monitoring systems, ventilation control, and regular disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, ventilation systems, disinfection technologies.","People":"Building occupants, students, staff, visitors.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities, facility managers."},{"Description":"Centralized heating and cooling systems can lead to inconsistent environmental conditions and energy wastage.","Impact":"Inefficient energy usage, discomfort for occupants, potential environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Implement individualized control systems, real-time monitoring, and automated adjustments based on environmental parameters.","Technologies":"Wireless sensor networks, individualized control systems, energy-efficient HVAC systems.","People":"Building occupants, energy managers, sustainability teams.","Owner":"Facility managers, energy managers, sustainability teams."}]}
